name: Gran Turismo 4 Prologue
description:
Gran Turismo 4 Prologue is an action game. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
Gran Turismo 4 Prologue is available on PlayStation 2.
It was produced by Kazunori Yamauchi. It was directed by Kazunori Yamauchi. Isamu Ohira and Masahiro Andoh scored the game.
